column2: an A.M. Eatery////Never bothered to check this place out
column3: thinking it was a sleep shop by the sound of it.  Finally
column4: the opportunity presented itself to give it a try.  The atmosphere is lounge-y
column5: the food is pretty (but good) while the portions are dainty.  Wide variety of brunch-y dishes with their own special touch.  `
